task.0: All Major Triads in 1st inversion (i.e. C: CEG becomes EGC) -- RH alone, LH alone, both, RH with base note, base note + hands together
task.1: Play a jazz standard (melody in RH and base note ONLY LH)
task.2: practice ALL minor triads in 1st inversion (e.g. C Eb G beccomes Eb G C). Right, Left, Both, etc.
task.4: Major 7th chords in 2nd inverstion (e.g. CEGB -> GBCE). Practice RH, LH & Both together
task.5: Practice Major 7th chords in root position (e.g. C E G B). LH, RH, Both, Root and chords, etc.
task.6: Pracice all major triads in 2nd inversion (e.g. CEG becomes GCE)
task.7: Voice lead minor triads around circle of 5ths (vary starting Inversion)
task.9: Practice Dominant 7th chords in root position (RH, LH, both, bass + chord)
task.10: Minor 7th chords in root position (eg. Cm7 - C Eb G Bb)
task.13: voice lead major triads through circle of 5ths (vary starting position)
task.14: Practice 3 and 7 for dominant 7th chords (eg. C7 -> E Bb)
task.15: Practice 7 and 3 for Dominant 7th chords (eg. C7 -> Bb E)
task.16: Practice Minor 7th chords in 1st inversion (eg. C Eb G Bb -> Eb G Bb C)
task.17: Minor 7th chords in 2nd inversion (e.g. Cm7 -> G Bb C Eb)
task.18: Minor 7th chords 3rd inversion (eg. Cm7 -> Bb C Eb G)
task.19: play root position chords in both hands for a few songs in a fakebook or lead sheet
task.20: Major 3rd chords 3rd inversion (CEGB -> BCEG). RH, LH, both hands
task.21: Minor Triads 2nd inversion (e.g. C Eb G becomes G C Eb)
task.22: Play the shells (3 and 7 or 7 and 3) for chords in a fake book
task.23: practice Minor 7 b5 chords in first inversion (e.g. Cm7b5 -> Eb Gb Bb C)
task.24: practice m75b chords in 2nd inversion (e.g. cm7b5 -> Gb, Bb, C, Eb)
task.25: practice minor 7 b5 chords in 3rd inversion (e.g. Cm7b5 -> Bb C Eb Gb)
task.26: Practice 3 and 7 shells of Minor 7th chords (e.g. Cm -> Eb Bb)
task.27: practice diatonic chords in every key (eg C -> CMaj7, Dm7, Em7, Fmaj7, G7, Am7, Bm7b7)
task.28: V I resolutions from root to 2nd inverion (eg. C7 -> FMaj7, CEGBb -> CEFA)
task.29: practice 7 and 3 of major 7th chords (e.g. CMaj7 -> BE)
task.30: eoice lead Major 7th chords through circle of 5ths (from all inversions, root to 2nd, 1st to 3rd, 2nd to root and 3rd to 1st
task.31: Voice lead m7 chords from all inversions (e.g. Cm7 -> Fm7 ->Bbm7 etc.)
task.32: practice playing the 3 and 7 of all major 7th chords (Major 3rd and Major 7th)
task.33: Practice a standard, but playing the chord in the LH and melody in RH
task.34: Practice Minor Major 7ths from root position (e.g. CmM7 -> C Eb G B)
task.35: Practice V I resolutions from 2nd inversion to root (e.g. C7 -> FMaj7. GBbCE -> FACE
task.36: practice Minor Major 7th chords 1st inversion (e.g. CmM7 -> EbGBC)
task.37: Practice Major 7th chords in first inversion (e.g. CEGB -> EGBC)
task.38: Minor Major 7th chords 2nd inversion (e.g. CmM7 -> GBCEb)
task.39: Minor major 7th chords in 3rd inversion (e.g. CmM7 -> BCEbG)
task.40: V I resolutions 3rd to 1st (e.g. C7 FMaj7 -> BbCEG -> ACEF
task.41: V I resolutions 1st inversion to 3rd inversion
task.42: play some songs in a fake book, melody RH and mix bass note and chords LH
task.43: Major ii V I resolutions (Root 2nd Root) Dm7-root-> G7 2nd inv. -> CMaj7-root
task.44: Major ii V I resolutions, 1st, 3rd, 1st (e.g. Dm7 G7 CMaj7: FACD, FGBD, EGBC)
task.45: voice lead dominant 7ths through circle of 5ths (e.g. C7->F7) For all 4 inversions (Roott->2nd, 1st->3rd, 2nd->root, 3rd->1st)
task.46: Major ii V I resolutions, 2nd, Root, 2nd (e.g. Dm7, G7, CMaj7 -> ACDF, GBDF GBCE
task.47: All Major scales (both hands, 1 and 2 octaves)
task.48: Practice 7th and 3rd of Minor 7th chords (e.g. Cm7 -> Bb Eb)
task.50: Practice Minor 7b5, root position (RH, LH, both, bass and RH)
task.51: improvise over ii V I (major) focusing on leaving space
task.52: minor ii V I (root, 3rd, root) eg. DFAbC -> DFGB -> CEbGB
task.53: Play some songs in a fake book. Playing Root with LH and chords (any inversion) in RH
task.55: Practice minor ii V i (2nd, root, 2nd) (eg. AbCDF -> GBDF -> GACEb)
task.57: 12 bar blues for: B, E, A, D
task.59: Practice 12 bar blues with: Eb, Ab, Db, F#
task.61: Practice this 2-5-1 lick (for C, F, Bb, Eb)

task.68: Jazz blues for Bb and Eb
task.69: Jazz blues for C and F
task.70: jazz blues for D and G
task.71: jazz blues for E and A

little tough to form quickly
Update: actually quite easy

notes.42: last time did Crystal Silence and Cotton Tail
notes.43:
2 ways of doing this (practicing both is great):

1. Think about the chords and guide the fingers to the keys
2. in order to get faster at knowing the chords, do not think about the order of the circle of 5ths. Instead, think about what the 1 chord is, and move the keys such that your stay in the key
notes.44: slow. Again focusing on hitting the notes of the 1 rather than thinking of the chord in the circleof 5ths
notes.45: getting a little faster. keep focusing on the chord notes, not on which fingers will be moving
notes.47: Just exchanged back and forth quickly naming things like - 2 sharps, 2 flats 3 sharps 3 flats, etc.
notes.48: not too bad, a little tough to know what I am putting in is correct, but getting somewhat fast
notes.51: I am doing 3rd root 3rd (because it is too easy starting from root on the ii). Did up to 4 sharps and 4 flats
notes.54:
Fast for BEADGCF
Slow for Bb Eb Ab Db F#

sounds nice to sharpen the root on the 2 (keep it there for the V as well, strong resolution to 1)

notes.56: rushed the end  (started with A and cycled around, so maybe cycle forward next time to even it out)
notes.57: Do the chords with both hands, light soloing ok, but the focus is on switching between the 1, 4, 5 for each chord
notes.60:
Minor on the bottom, major on top

ex.

C - C D Eb F G A B C

went around circle starting on B. Next time move forward because I had to rush through and those are the toughest to recall. Try to think about moving from major to minor then later think about major with a flattened 3rd
notes.61: Think of the chords mostly. In the first part you're outlining the rootless 2, then some accidentals around the 5 going down to land on the 3rd of 1
